name: Jelly Island
description:
Jelly Island is an action based game where you are the slime species. Before attacking the enemy, you must collect resources to build up your army and prepare.

The humans have been attempting to destroy all slimes in order to use the resources on your land, but you must build up an army and defeat them before it's too late!

Made in 24 hours by one person as a practice for the upcoming Ludum Dare 33 game development competiton. Made with Java, LWJGL, and Slick2D. Jelly Island will run on Linux, OS X, and Windows.

Jelly Island is not the prettiest game due to the time limit it was created in, but gameplay is solid and fun. I have fixed all notable bugs that I've found, but I will fix any others that may come about.
